option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.*?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<AnchorPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.treksathi.controllers.LoginController"> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="350.0" prefWidth="500.0" spacing="15.0"> <Label styleClass="title" text="Login to TrekSathi" /> <TextField fx:id="usernameField" promptText="Username" /> <PasswordField fx:id="passwordField" promptText="Password" /> <Button onAction="#handleLogin" text="Login" /> <Label fx:id="statusLabel" /> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="5"> <Label text="Don't have an account yet?" /> <Hyperlink fx:id="signupLink" onAction="#handleSignupLink" text="Sign Up" /> </HBox> <padding> <Insets left="50.0" right="50.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </AnchorPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.*?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>
<AnchorPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/17.0.12" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.treksathi.controllers.LoginController"> <VBox alignment="CENTER" prefHeight="350.0" prefWidth="500.0" spacing="15.0"> <Label styleClass="title" text="Login to TrekSathi" /> <TextField fx:id="usernameField" promptText="Username" /> <PasswordField fx:id="passwordField" promptText="Password" /> <Button onAction="#handleLogin" text="Login" /> <Label fx:id="statusLabel" /> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="5"> <Label text="Don't have an account yet?" /> <Hyperlink fx:id="signupLink" onAction="#handleSignupLink" text="Sign Up" /> </HBox> <padding> <Insets left="50.0" right="50.0" /> </padding> </VBox> </AnchorPane>
